text: What are your main stress factors in everyday life?
What is your primary source of positive emotions?
How do you influence the emotional state of your close ones and surroundings?
options: Resolve conflicts and improve others' mood
Induce negative emotions through your actions or words

text: What is your favorite strategy for stress relief?
How do you react to your own mistakes or failures?
options: Accept them as part of the learning process and an opportunity for growth
Begin to feel sad and experience significant stress
Quickly move on to finding solutions and correcting mistakes
Feel a loss of confidence and have a negative attitude towards yourself
